pytket.pyzx¶

Module for conversion between PyZX and \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) primitives.

pytket.pyzx.tk_to_pyzx(tkcircuit: Union[pytket._circuit.Circuit, pytket._routing.PhysicalCircuit]) → pyzx.circuit.Circuit¶

Convert a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit to a pyzx.Circuit.

Return type:Circuit
Parameters:prog – A circuit to be converted
Returns:The converted circuit
pytket.pyzx.pyzx_to_tk(pyzx_circ: pyzx.circuit.Circuit) → pytket._circuit.Circuit¶

Convert a pyzx.Circuit to a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit . All PyZX basic gate operations are currently supported by pytket. Run pyzx_circuit_name.to_basic_gates() before conversion.

Return type:Circuit
Parameters:prog – A circuit to be converted
Returns:The converted circuit
